----- Original Message -----
From: "Julie Stauffer" <jnjstau@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, January 03, 2003 4:55 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: transforming


> <<Why not start by trying to be the person you want them to be?>>
>
> Boy, this was an eye-opener for me. I realized that I wanted my kids to
be
> perfect, not make mistakes, be grumpy, be forgiving, be ideal. It has
sure
> taken the pressure off now that we can just be us.
>
> Julie
>
>
Will this work on the hubby too???The more I nag the less he does. I think I
need to have a more positive attitude and keep going . Maybe eventually he
come around. Starting to realize what I have been put him through. Good
thing he is forgiving!

messages.subject: Re: transforming
messages.msgSnippet: Boy, this was an eye-opener for me.  I realized that I wanted my kids to be perfect, not make
messages.messageBody:
<<Why not start by trying to be the person you want them to be?>>

Boy, this was an eye-opener for me. I realized that I wanted my kids to be
perfect, not make mistakes, be grumpy, be forgiving, be ideal. It has sure
taken the pressure off now that we can just be us.

Julie
